data.title: Supply Partners
data.text:
W Abrasives, a brand of Winoa Group, is the world leader in sales and manufacturing of high carbon steel shot & grit. In addition to offering a high-end, long lasting and highly efficient product, WA’s value added technical sales approach brings an unsurpassed value to our foundry, forging and surface preparation customers.

WA’s team of 26 technical experts, 3 trial and technical centers (one in Houston, TX) and specific products developed for the cleaning and surface preparation markets, will help reduce total overall blasting costs and increase productivity.

WA’s state-of-the-art manufacturing process and ongoing investment in product development is focused on quality that ensures consistent and durable abrasives well beyond industry standards and specifications.

WA’s mission is to improve the performance of our customers by offering:

High performance steel abrasives

Consulting services and technical support

Process control tools

Testing solutions in the WA technical center

When The Nowland Industrial Group takes on a Supply Partner's line of products, we become an extension of that company with the goal of fast-tracking sales expansion in the West. We work in conjunction with our Supply Partners to define target markets, refine goals, and take action to achieve the foundation of a plan to drive sales and capture market share in the West.

Capturing market share involves more than simply taking on our Supply Partners' product lines. We not only follow up with on-going sales and technical support, but help create product visibility as well. The Nowland Industrial Group makes it easy and profitable to promote our Supply Partners' products within our already-established distributor networks as well as through direct end user calls. Creating direct lines of communication and reporting, we continuously build trust and confidence with our Supply Partners, distributors, and end use customers.
